refentry.para: This page lists all types used by API Scilab.

refsection.refpurpose: This a pointer of internal information provided by Scilab engine, you just have to forwarding it to API function.
refsection.para: Like pvApiCtx before, please to do use it. You may have to chance its structure at any moment.

refsection.refpurpose: It is the type of Scilab variable in API Scilab.
refsection.para: Each API Scilab that read or write in Scilab varaible use it to reference a variable.

refsection.refpurpose: scilabStatus is used by API Scilab to provide a status of execution.
It is a list of optional arguments given in the call.
refsection.para: You may use scilab_getOptional to retrieve optional values.
